body_html:
@siryog90 @reedwm I take a look at the implementation of linear_to_mel_weight_matrix. It looks that num_spectrogram_bins is only passed to math_ops.linspace, which already performs validations in both shape function and kernel. For that I think it makes sense to remove the validation in python, so that non python int values could be used.

Create a PR #17404 for the fix. Please take a look.

body:
@siryog90 @reedwm I take a look at the implementation of `linear_to_mel_weight_matrix`. It looks that `num_spectrogram_bins` is only passed to `math_ops.linspace`, which already performs validations in both shape function and kernel. For that I think it makes sense to remove the validation in python, so that non python int values could be used.

Create a PR #17404 for the fix. Please take a look.
